name: NamiTrade

attributes.documentation: Math operations with safety checks

attributes.documentation: @title Multisignature wallet - Allows multiple parties to agree on transactions before execution.
attributes.name: NamiMultiSigWallet

attributes.documentation: @dev Fallback function allows to deposit ether.

@dev Allows to add a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param owner Address of new owner.
attributes.name: addOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows to remove an owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param owner Address of owner.
attributes.name: removeOwner
replaceOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows to change the number of required confirmations. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param _required Number of required confirmations.
attributes.name: changeRequirement
submitTransaction

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows an owner to confirm a transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: confirmTransaction

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows an owner to revoke a confirmation for a transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: revokeConfirmation

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows anyone to execute a confirmed transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: executeTransaction
isConfirmed
addTransaction
getConfirmationCount
getTransactionCount

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns list of owners.
 @return List of owner addresses.
attributes.name: getOwners
getConfirmations
getTransactionIds

@param _value the amount to send

attributes.documentation:
make new controller
require input address is not a controller
execute any time in sc state
attributes.name: setController

attributes.documentation:
remove controller
require input address is a controller
execute any time in sc state

 @param _amount value ether in wei to withdraw

*
update price fci daily

attributes.documentation:
before buy users need to place buy Order
function buy fci
only controller can execute in phrase running
attributes.name: buyFci

attributes.documentation:
* before controller buy fci for user
user nead to place sell order
attributes.name: placeSellFciOrder

attributes.documentation:
* function sellFci
only controller can execute in phare running

attributes.documentation: first controller open one round for netf revenue
attributes.name: openNetfRevenueRound

attributes.documentation:
* this function update balance of NETF revenue funds add NAC to funds
only executable if round open and round not withdraw yet
attributes.name: depositNetfRevenue

attributes.documentation:
* this function update balance of NETF Funds remove NAC from funds
only executable if round open and round not withdraw yet
attributes.name: withdrawNetfRevenue

attributes.documentation:
after pause all investor to buy, sell and exchange fci on the market
controller or investor latch final fci of current round
attributes.name: latchTotalFci

attributes.documentation:
after all investor latch fci, controller change round state withdrawable
now investor can withdraw NAC from NetfRevenue funds of this round
and auto switch to unpause phrase
